LanguageData.ConPat_HasCap_Tooltip: Sets if there is a maximum cap for Blood Filtration, Blood Pumping and Breathing scaling.
LanguageData.ConPat_MaxCap_Tooltip: The maximum cap until the stats no longer give any increases to Consciousness
LanguageData.ConPat_BloodPumping_Tooltip: How much each stat increases Consciousness.\n20% means that 150% Blood Pumping increases Consciousness by 10% \n(20% default)
LanguageData.ConPat_BloodFiltration_Tooltip: How much each stat increases Consciousness.\n20% means that 150% Blood Filtration increases Consciousness by 10%. \n(10% default)
LanguageData.ConPat_Breathing_Tooltip: How much each stat increases Consciousness.\n20% means that 150% Breathing increases Consciousness by 10% \n(20% default)
